allow: Bash(powershell -NoProfile -Command "$path1 = ''E:\Projects\unreal_projects\KBS\Source\KBS\Classes\GameMechanics\Tactical\Grid\Subsystems\GridSubsystem.h''; $bytes = [System.IO.File]::ReadAllBytes($path1); Write-Host ''GridSubsystem.h - First 3 bytes:'' $bytes[0] $bytes[1] $bytes[2]; if ($bytes[0] -eq 239 -and $bytes[1] -eq 187 -and $bytes[2] -eq 191) { Write-Host ''Has UTF-8 BOM'' } else { Write-Host ''No UTF-8 BOM'' }")
